Garfield.name: Garfield
Garfield.author: Jim Davis
Garfield.description:
A cynical, lazy, lasagna-loving, Monday-hating, dog-punting, mailman-mauling fat cat. Garfield's passion for food and sleep is matched only by his aversion to diet and exercise. Garfield and his human Jon Arbuckle debuted on June 19, 1978, and have been enduring/endearing one another ever since.
Garfield got a lot of representation in media and experimental cartoons such as:
Garkov: https://joshmillard.com/garkov/
Permanent Monday: https://permanent-monday.blogspot.com/
Barfield loses his lunch (Not intended for readers under 18 years of age): http://www.thereverend.com/barfield/index.html
Calvin Dilbert and Garfield combo comic: https://www.sparehed.com/2014/04/16/calvin-garfield/
Ultimate Garfield: https://www.sparehed.com/2009/11/22/ultimate-garfield/
Nothing Garfield: https://www.sparehed.com/2007/08/08/nothing-garfield/
Lasagna Cat: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2AQkHXNVA-w9FA1m9VqO7A
Garfield minus Garfield (also supported trough /garfield_minus_garfield): https://garfieldminusgarfield.net/

Website: https://www.garfield.com/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/Garfield/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Garfield
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/garfield/characters-garfield

See also:
Garfield Classics,
Garfield minus Garfield,
Jon,
Peanuts

CalvinandHobbes.name: Calvin and Hobbes
CalvinandHobbes.author: Bill Watterson
CalvinandHobbes.description:
One of the most famous and popular comic strips of all time, Bill Watterson's Calvin and Hobbes has been a timeless worldwide favorite since its introduction in 1985. The beloved comic follows the richly imaginative adventures of 6-year-old Calvin and his trusty tiger, Hobbes. Whether you enjoyed it as a child while expanding your vocabulary, as an adult in the newspaper or if you are reacquainting yourself with these cultural icons, Calvin and Hobbes will continue to astound and delight you.

More representations of C&H in media:
Calvin Dilbert and Garfield combo comic: https://www.sparehed.com/2014/04/16/calvin-garfield/
Calvin on ritalin: https://www.sparehed.com/2009/08/24/calvin-on-retalin/

Website: https://www.calvinandhobbes.com/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/CalvinAndHobbes/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/calvinandhobbes
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/calvinandhobbes/about

See also:
Peanuts
CalvinandHobbes.help: The iconic duo of Calvin and Hobbes is assured to bring back memories of the good days of childhood.

XKCD.name: xkcd
XKCD.author: Randall Munroe
XKCD.description:
A webcomic of romance, sarcasm, math and language. The comic updates without fail every Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

Website: https://xkcd.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheXKCD/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/xkcd/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xkcd/
More info: https://xkcd.com/about/
XKCD.help: Randall Munroe explores romance, sarcasm, math and language every Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

Peanuts.name: Peanuts
Peanuts.author: Charles M. Schulz
Peanuts.description:
The iconic strip Peanuts is an enduring classic since the 1950s, and is still assured to make you laugh!

Facebook: https://facebook.com/Snoopy/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Snoopy
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/peanuts/characters

See also:
Peanuts Begins,
Garfield,
Calvin and Hobbes
Peanuts.help: Charles Schulz's classic about the adventures of Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the gang.

Peanuts_Begins.name: Peanuts Begins
Peanuts_Begins.author: Charles M. Schulz
Peanuts_Begins.description:
Stroll down memory lane with Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Lucy, Linus and the whole gang as they retrace the adventures what began on newspaper funny pages in 1950. Those were the days!

Disclaimer from GoComics: This historic comic is presented in its original form, unedited from the time period in which it was created. These images may contain harmful stereotypes, problematic and antiquated ideologies, or otherwise negative cultural depictions and themes indicative of the context in which it first appeared. We run these vintage comic strips to preserve a digital archive of the medium's early examples.

Facebook: https://facebook.com/Snoopy/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Snoopy
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/peanuts-begins/about

See also:
Peanuts
Peanuts_Begins.help: The original comics of Charles Schulz's Peanuts, revisited!

Cyanide_and_Happiness.name: Cyanide and Happiness
Cyanide_and_Happiness.author: Dave McElfatrick, Kris Wilson and Rob DenBleyker
Cyanide_and_Happiness.description:
Cyanide & Happiness (C&H) is a webcomic created by Rob DenBleyker, Kris Wilson, Dave McElfatrick and Matt Melvin. The comic has been running since 2005 and is published on the website explosm.net along with animated shorts in the same style. Matt Melvin left C&H in 2014, and several other people have contributed to the comic and to the animated shorts.

Disclaimer: **Comics might contain sensitive / mature content, which might not be advised for persons under 18 of age.**

Website: https://explosm.net/
Comic generator: https://explosm.net/rcg
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/explosm
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Explosm
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/ExplosmEntertainment
Instagram: https://instagram.com/explosmofficial
Cyanide_and_Happiness.help: The classic comic of dark humor from the team of Explosm is assured not to leave you cold!

Frazz.name: Frazz
Frazz.author: Jeff Mallett
Frazz.description:
Frazz by Jef Mallett follows the adventures of an unexpected role model: an elementary-school janitor who's also a Renaissance man. While he's sweeping the hall, he's whistling Beethoven. Frazz appears in 200 newspapers worldwide, including the Los Angeles Times, Seattle Times, Chicago Tribune and Detroit News.

Facebook: https://facebook.com/frazzcomic/
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/frazz/about
Frazz.help: Join the adventures of Frazz the songwriter-janitor who is every kid's buddy!

Garfield_minus_Garfield.name: Garfield minus Garfield
Garfield_minus_Garfield.author: Dan Walsh
Garfield_minus_Garfield.description:
Garfield Minus Garfield is dedicated to removing Garfield from the Garfield comic strips in order to reveal the existential angst of a certain young Mr. Jon Arbuckle. It is a journey deep into the mind of an isolated young everyman as he fights a losing battle against loneliness and depression in a quiet American suburb.

What does Jim Davis think of Garfield minus Garfield: https://garfieldminusgarfield.net/private/61669516/fSymsOGXOgrmmihjqTZaCBY2
More info: https://garfieldminusgarfield.net/post/61669282/the-garfield-minus-garfield-faq

See also:
Garfield,
Garfield Classics,
Jon
Garfield_minus_Garfield.help: Revisit Garfield without the iconic orange and black cat, to see how can loneliness reveal existential angst in a daily life.

Frank-and-Ernest.name: Frank and Ernest
Frank-and-Ernest.author: Bob Thaves
Frank-and-Ernest.description:
Frank & Ernest chronicles the adventures of two 'every man' characters who are anything but ordinary! They are able to appear in different settings, time periods - even manifested as things and creatures other than people. The variety in the strip extends to their observations about a wide variety of subjects.

Website: https://frankandernest.com/
Animations: https://frankandernest.com/comics/animation.html
Puzzle: https://frankandernest.com/fun/puzzle.html
FAQ: https://frankandernest.com/faq.html
Frank-and-Ernest.help: Enjoy the iconic comic from Bob Thaves!

BroomHilda.name: Broom Hilda
BroomHilda.author: Russell Myers
BroomHilda.description: Living in an enchanted forest with surrealistic landscapes, the engaging characters of Broom Hilda happily have no connection with reality. Other comic characters are extensions or distortions of reality, but Broom Hilda deals in pure fantasy, making the strip bewitchingly unique. Here in the forest, the inhabitants maintain a standard of madness where total irrelevance is the only relevancy. The strip is simply a loony-bin where what’s said and done often makes no sense whatsoever, much to the joy of its millions of fans.
BroomHilda.help: The adventures of a man-crazy, cigar-smoking, beer-guzzling, 1,500-year-old witch and her motley crew of friends!

Cheer-up-emo-kid.name: Cheer up Emo kid
Cheer-up-emo-kid.author: Enzo comics
Cheer-up-emo-kid.description:
'Cheer Up, Emo Kid started in 2008 as an amateur comic about relationships and events in my life, and has since graduated into a professional amateur comic about relationships and events in my life. It loosely follows the non-adventures of Zeke & Frank, two friends constantly at odds with each other in their attitudes towards relationships; and their friends Steve & Sue, an extraordinarily ordinary couple just going through the motions of monogamy.[...]' - Enzo.
Facebook: https://facebook.com/cheerupemokid
Twitter: https://twitter.com/enzocomics
Instagram: https://instagram.com/enzocomics
Tumblr: https://enzocomics.tumblr.com/
Website: https://cheerupemokid.com/
Cheer-up-emo-kid.help: A comic about friendship and love made by Enzo Comics.

brevity.name: Brevity
brevity.author: Dan Thompson
brevity.description:
With his random but always funny comics, Dan Thompson knows how to twist a situation with a whole new perspective.
Facebook: https://facebook.com/brevitycomic
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BrevityComic
brevity.help: Enjoy the humor of Dan Thompson as he twist seemingly normal situations into a whole new perspective.

Cats-Cafe.name: Cat's Cafe
Cats-Cafe.author: Matt Tarpley
Cats-Cafe.description:
Everyone is welcome at Cat’s Café! There is always a seat and someone to talk to. Follow Cat, Penguin, and Rabbit along with a variety of other special animals, form a wonderful place where everyone can feel warm, fuzzy, and accepted.

Facebook: https://facebook.com/catscafecomics
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CatsCafeComics
Instagram: https://instagram.com/catscafecomics/
Tumblr: https://catscafecomics.tumblr.com/
Website: https://www.catscafecomics.com/
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/cats-cafe/characters
See also:
Garfield
Cats-Cafe.help: Join Cat's cafe where wholesomeness and good vibes are always on the menu!

Popeye.name: Popeye
Popeye.author: Bud Sagendorf (Dailies) and Hy Eisman (Sundays)
Popeye.description:
He's short, balding, ornery and downright ugly by anyone's standards. But countless numbers of fans have grown up admiring and identifying with this unpretentious hero since his introduction to the public in 1929. With one of his cartoons airing somewhere in the world nearly every minute of every day, Popeye remains one of the most widely recognized and best-loved personalities ever.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Popeye/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PopeyeTweetsk
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/popeye
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqvXAiNyn8pd9SVPclWfJTg
More info: https://comicskingdom.com/popeye/about
Popeye.help: The iconic sailor is ready to roll on adventures with his incredible spinach strength!!

Artic-Circle.name: Artic Circle
Artic-Circle.author: Alex Hallatt
Artic-Circle.description:
Arctic Circle is a comic strip about three penguins who have migrated from the Antarctic to the small town of Snowpeak within the Arctic Circle.

The penguins have joined a polar bear, a snow bunny, a lemming and an Arctic tern. Collectively, they deal with everything the 21st century has to throw at them, including climate change, fashion, Facebook and genetically modified organisms gone wild.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/arcticcirclecartoons/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/alexhtweets
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alexhallattcartoons/
More info: https://comicskingdom.com/artic-circle/about
Artic-Circle.help: A band of penguins and their friends have moved to the little town of Snowpeak, ready to deal with everything the 21st century has to throw at them!

Lockhorns.name: The lockhorns
Lockhorns.author: Bunny Hoest and John Reiner
Lockhorns.description:
Join Leroy and Loretta Lockhorn in the award-winning comic strips gently spoofs the state of marital bliss, poking fun at the foibles of both partners. Their snappy repartee and witty banter has made them a perennial favorite.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheLockhornsComic
More info: https://comicskingdom.com/lockhorns/about
Lockhorns.help: Join Loretta and Leroy Lockhorns in their humorous couple!

Marvin.name: Marvin
Marvin.author: Tom Armstrong
Marvin.description:
Marvin features a precocious red-headed toddler who spends much of his time lost in his own thoughts and fantasy adventures.

Like most young children - and too many adults - Marvin is convinced that he is the center of the universe. And as such, he believes that everything and everyone else revolves around him. He may be right. Marvin is definitely the epicenter of all the activity and chaos in his family! Marvin relegates his mom and dad, Jenny and Jeff, to the position of household staff.

More info: https://comicskingdom.com/marvin/about
Marvin.help: Join the Miller family as they live adventures and good laughs!

Zits.name: Zits
Zits.author: Jerry Scott and Jim Borgman
Zits.description:
Sixteen-year-old Jeremy Duncan is a high school freshman and an aspiring musician. He daydreams about the day when his band, Goat Cheese Pizza, records their first monster hit single, and they all pile into his van for their cross-country, sold-out concert tour. Between naps, study hall and band practice, Jeremy still manages to find time to be the star of the hugely popular comic strip, Zits.

Created in 1997 by Pulitzer Prize-winning editorial cartoonist Jim Borgman and Reuben Award-winning cartoonist/writer Jerry Scott, Zits appears in more than 1,600 newspapers worldwide in 45 countries and is translated into 15 different languages. The comic has an estimated daily readership of more than 200 million readers. Zits is the only strip in comics history to achieve that milestone in the short span of nine years.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zitscomics
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zitsguys/
More info: https://comicskingdom.com/zits/about
Zits.help: Follow Jeremy Duncan as he tries to balance family, school and social life, through high school and his band!

Hi-and-Lois.name: Hi and Lois
Hi-and-Lois.author: Brian Walker, Greg Walker and Chance Browne
Hi-and-Lois.description:
Hi and Lois was created in 1954 by Mort Walker and Dik Browne, two of the most successful cartoonists in comic history. Provoking a strong emotional response from readers right from the beginning, it grew steadily in popularity, passing the 1,000-newspaper mark in 1982. It is continued today by their sons, writers Brian and Greg Walker and artist Chance Browne. Whether it is busy parents juggling jobs and raising a family, a teen coping with his self-image, sibling rivalry among the youngsters, or a toddler learning about the world and her place in it, Hi and Lois has kept pace with mainstream life and found the gentle humor in familiar situations.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hiandlois
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ericreavesart
More info: https://comicskingdom.com/hi-and-lois/about
Hi-and-Lois.help: Follow the adventures of a little family who always know how to find humor into family life!

Safely-Endangered.name: Safely Endangered
Safely-Endangered.author: Chris McCoy
Safely-Endangered.description:
"Safely Endangered is a webcomic drawn by me, Chris McCoy, a UK based cartoonist. I created the strip in late 2012 and began publishing comics via Tumblr. Ever since 2014, Safely Endangered has been published on Webtoon. New episodes are published every week and you can read over 600 free comics for free there. You can also find me at the occasional UK convention! When I'm not drawing comics, I like to play guitar, drink beers and watch re-runs of f.r.i.e.n.d.s :)" -Chris McCoy 

Other Works:
Your Adventure:https://www.webtoons.com/en/comedy/your-adventure/list?title_no=506.
Facebook: https://facebook.com/safelyendangered
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EndangeredComic
Website: https://safelyendangered.com/
More info: https://safelyendangered.com/pages/comics
Safely-Endangered.help: Silly comics for silly people updated each Monday and Wednesday!

Carl.name: Carl
Carl.author: Hussein Traboulsi and Claudia Z.
Carl.description:
Carl is a robot psychiatrist that suddenly becomes sentient. He starts longing to be human but his creator and father figure Dr Alda prevents him from showing his feelings out of fear of losing him. More challenges arise when Alda’s arch nemesis sets out to destroy them both.
Hussein Traboulsi's twitter: https://twitter.com/hughsain1
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hughsain/?hl=en
Claudia Z. twitter: https://twitter.com/SWEETC0UPS
More info: https://www.webtoons.com/en/slice-of-life/carl/list?title_no=1216
Carl.help: Join the adventures of the sentient robot Carl updated each Tuesday and Sunday!

BlueChair.name: BlueChair
BlueChair.author: Shen
BlueChair.description:
"I'm the cartoonist behind Bluechair, Owlturd, and Live With Yourself! My comics are usually based on thoughts I have when I forget to think "no, wait, that's stupid." If you say my name 3 times, I won't necessarily appear before you, but I might suddenly become nervous and not know why." -Shen

Other Works:
Live with yourself: https://www.webtoons.com/en/comedy/live-with-yourself/list?title_no=919.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/owlturdcomix
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shenanigansen
Website: https://safelyendangered.com/
More info: https://safelyendangered.com/pages/comics
BlueChair.help: The internet's favorite visual stand-up comic to make memes out of, updated each Wednesday and Saturday!

Adventures-of-God.name: Adventures of God
Adventures-of-God.author: Teo and Corey
Adventures-of-God.description:
In this slice of (eternal) life, you'll meet God, visit Heaven and learn that what goes on behind the pearly gates isn't exactly the way the good book describes it. For starters, it's a pretty unhealthy work environment - what with God's ginormous, fragile ego and heavy drinking problem. The good news is that while heaven is a lot less holy than expected, it's much more hilarious too.

Other Works:
Deadlove: https://www.webtoons.com/en/slice-of-life/deadlove/list?title_no=2460
My Dictator Boyfriend: https://www.webtoons.com/en/comedy/my-dictator-boyfriend/list?title_no=1391
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/adventuresofgod
Twitter: https://twitter.com/adventuresofteo
More info: https://www.webtoons.com/en/comedy/adventures-of-god/list?title_no=853
Adventures-of-God.help: The adventures of God, Gabe, Satan and Ebag updated each Tuesday and Saturday!

Live-with-yourself.name: Live with yourself
Live-with-yourself.author: Shen and David Mercier
Live-with-yourself.description:
An explosive time-space accident leaves happy-go-lucky 20-something Todd living with himself, himself, and himself. You get to watch the struggle.

Other Works:
BlueChair:https://www.webtoons.com/en/slice-of-life/bluechair/list?title_no=199
MercWorks:https://www.webtoons.com/en/slice-of-life/mercworks/list?title_no=426
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/owlturdcomix
Twitter: https://twitter.com/shenanigansen
Facebook: https://facebook.com/mercworks.net
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MercWorks
Website: https://www.mercworks.net/
More info: https://www.mercworks.net/lwys
Live-with-yourself.help: Watch Todd live with himself at different time of his life each Tuesday and Sunday!!

System32comics.name: System32Comics
System32comics.author: System32
System32comics.description:
If a computer could talk, what would it say? A tech webcomic!
Other Works: https://twitter.com/System32ComicsA
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/System32Comics
Twitter: https://twitter.com/system32comics
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/System32Comics
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/system32comics/
 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/System32Comics
More info: https://www.webtoons.com/en/challenge/system32comics/list?title_no=235074
System32comics.help: A tech webcomic in a world where computers can talk!

TheGamer.name: The Gamer
TheGamer.author: Sangyoung Seong and Sang-A
TheGamer.description:
Jihan Han is your typical high school student -- minus the fact the he’s acquired the special ability to view the world around him as a video-game. Not long after this discovery, he stumbles upon a hidden world filled with others just like him. Now, amidst juggling homework and completing quests, Jihan must learn how to navigate his newfound power in order to level up in life.
More info: https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/the-gamer/list?title_no=88
TheGamer.help: What if your life turned into a video game? Follow Jihan Han's adventures each Friday

BigNate.name: Big Nate
BigNate.author: Lincoln Peirce
BigNate.description:
Aspiring cartoonist Nate Wright is the star of Big Nate, the daily and Sunday comic strip distributed by NEA since 1991. Nate is 11 years old, four-and-a-half feet tall, and the all-time record holder for detentions in school history. He's a self-described genius and sixth grade Renaissance Man. Nate, who lives with his dad and older sister, enjoys pestering his family and teachers with his sarcasm.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bignatebooks/
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/bignate/about
BigNate.help: Class clown. Self-described genius. Mischief maker. Big Nate knows trouble.

GetFuzzy.name: Get Fuzzy
GetFuzzy.author: Darby Conley
GetFuzzy.description:
House-cats are known to be aloof, but "cat-titude" reaches new heights in Get Fuzzy, the bitingly hilarious comic strip from cartoonist Darby Conley. Available daily and Sunday and appearing in 650 newspapers nationwide, Get Fuzzy is a wry portrait of single life, with pets. At the center of this warm and fuzzy romp is Rob Wilco, a single, mild-mannered ad executive and guardian of anthropomorphic scamps Bucky and Satchel.
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/getfuzzy/about
GetFuzzy.help: Get Fuzzy is a wry portrait of single life, with pets.

BeetleBailey.name: Beetle Bailey
BeetleBailey.author: Mort Walker
BeetleBailey.description:
Beetle Bailey, which started as a college-themed strip in 1950, debuted inauspiciously in 12 newspapers. After six months, it had signed on only 25 clients, and King Features Syndicate considered dropping it. The Korean War was heating up at that time, so Mort Walker decided to have Beetle enlist in the Army. He quickly picked up 100 newspapers. When Mort won the National Cartoonist Society’s award as the best cartoonist of the year for 1953, Beetle Bailey had become a certified success. Today, after more than six decades, Mort Walker’s creation is still one of the most popular comic strips in the world.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/beetlebaileypage
More info: https://comicskingdom.com/beetle-bailey-1/about
BeetleBailey.help: Follow the adventures of Beetle as he resist authority in the army.

TheBoondocks.name: The Boondocks
TheBoondocks.author: Aaron McGruder
TheBoondocks.description:
Meet Aaron McGruder’s The Boondocks: Huey and Riley Freeman, Jazmine DuBois, and Huey’s best friend, Caesar. This comic strip reflects the racial diversity and complexity of our world. Combining Huey’s childish antics with contemporary political and social satire, the strip explores the terrain where dashikis and Brand Nubian CDs meet The Gap and Hanson.
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/boondocks/about
TheBoondocks.help: A popular and controversial strip, The Boondocks satirizes African American culture and American politics as seen through the eyes of young, black radical Huey Freeman.

Pickles.name: Pickles
Pickles.author: Brian Crane
Pickles.description:
Pickles, syndicated by The Washington Post Writers Group for more than 26 years, tells the story of Earl and Opal Pickles as they enjoy their golden years surrounded by friends and family. A perennial favorite with readers of all ages, Pickles has topped comics polls across the nation again and again, and was named the best comic strip of 2001 by the National Cartoonists’ Society.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/picklescomic/
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/pickles/about
Pickles.help: Pickles is a daily and Sunday comic strip by Brian Crane focusing on a retired couple in their seventies, Earl and Opal Pickles.

PearlsBeforeSwine.name: Pearls Before Swine
PearlsBeforeSwine.author: Stephan Pastis
PearlsBeforeSwine.description:
At its heart, Pearls Before Swine is the comic strip tale of two friends: an arrogant Rat who thinks he knows it all and a slow-witted Pig who doesn't know any better. Together, this pair offers caustic commentary on humanity's quest for the unattainable.
Website: https://stephanpastis.wordpress.com/
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/pearlsbeforeswine/meet-the-cast
PearlsBeforeSwine.help: Join the chronicles of the daily lives of an ensemble cast of suburban anthropomorphic animals: Pig, Rat, Zebra, Goat, and a fraternity of crocodiles.

Chibird.name: Chibird
Chibird.author: Chibird
Chibird.description:
Positive, motivational drawings to brighten your day! Featuring everyday life with Jackie, Chibird, Motivational Penguin, Shy Ghost, Positive Bunny, Hedgehog, and more! Find Chibird at chibird.com or @ChibirdArt on Instagram and Facebook! :D (Under Creative Commons : https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/)
Website: https://chibird.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/chibird
Shop: https://chibird.myshopify.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ChibirdArt/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chibirdart/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChibirdArt
iMessage stickers: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/chibird-penguin-stickers/id1173229367
More info: https://chibird.com/faq
Chibird.help: Cute and motivational drawings to brighten your day!

WarAndPeas.name: War and Peas
WarAndPeas.author: Elizabeth and Jonathan
WarAndPeas.description:
A robot hopelessly in love, a promiscuous yet self-assured witch, and a fatally laid-back grim reaper. This never-ending webcomic of woefully funny stories will leave you cry-laughing or the other way around.
Website: https://warandpeas.com/
Shop: https://warandpeas.com/shop
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warnpeas
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/war.and.peas
Twitter: https://twitter.com/warandpeass
More info: https://warandpeas.com/about/
WarAndPeas.help: War and Peas is an ongoing webcomic made by two individuals, Elizabeth Pich and Jonathan Kunz.

HumansAreStupid.name: Humans are stupid
HumansAreStupid.author: Bino Comics
HumansAreStupid.description:
Funny comics about stupid people, a robot and various situations of life. 
About: https://www.webtoons.com/en/challenge/humans-are-stupid/list?title_no=54265#
HumansAreStupid.help: Funny comics about stupid people and robots.

Maximumble.name: Maximumble
Maximumble.author: Chris Hallbeck
Maximumble.description:
Comics for your brain machine. (No new comics since december 2021, check the twitter profile for new animations)
Website: https://maximumble.thebookofbiff.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/maximumble
Instagram: https://instagram.com/chrishallbeck
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChrisHallbeck
Tumblr: https://chrishallbeck.tumblr.com/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/chrishallbeck
Store: https://chrishallbeckstore.com/
Maximumble.help: Chris Hallbeck create Maximumble, comics for your brain machine.

PoorlyDrawnLines.name: Poorly Drawn Lines
PoorlyDrawnLines.author: Reza Farazmand
PoorlyDrawnLines.description:
Poorly Drawn Lines is a humorous comic strip updating three times weekly. Subjects are varied and include space travel, friendship, animals, people pretending to be animals, shapes, conversation, and the future. Read the full archive of over 200 strips at poorlydrawnlines.com. 
Website: https://poorlydrawnlines.com/
Facebook: https://facebook.com/poorlydrawnlines
Instagram: https://instagram.com/poorlydrawnlines
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PDLComics
More info: https://www.gocomics.com/poorly-drawn-lines/about
PoorlyDrawnLines.help: Poorly Drawn Lines, by Reza Farazmand, is a classic comic strip about friendship, animals and humor.

Heathcliff.name: Heathcliff
Heathcliff.author: George Cately
Heathcliff.description:
Called the "Cat of the Century" by a major cat magazine, Heathcliff has been an incredible success. The cat is loved and recognized by millions in all corners of the globe. In addition to being published in hundreds of papers, the comic has been animated in more than 80 television shows, published in over 50 books with over a million copies in print and featured in a full-length motion picture. Heathcliff cartoons have even hung on the walls of the Louvre in Paris.

About: https://www.gocomics.com/heathcliff/about
Heathcliff.help: Follow Heathcliff, the first internet orange cat!

AndyCapp.name: Andy Capp
AndyCapp.author: Reg Smythe
AndyCapp.description:
Andy and his wife, Flo, live out the epitome of functional dysfunction. From the pub to the bedroom, Andy’s misadventures paint an indelible portrait of an extremely British battle of the sexes. Join Andy and Flo as they bicker their way through life. Their banter can be hostile, caring, sarcastic and adorable: the perfect ingredients for a lasting marriage.
Website: https://www.creators.com/read/andy-capp
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorldofAndyCapp/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WorldofAndyCapp
Tumblr: https://starmirrorcartoons.tumblr.com/
About: https://www.gocomics.com/andycapp/about
AndyCapp.help: Join Andy and Flo Capp through their adventures!

Ziggy.name: Ziggy
Ziggy.author: Tom Wilson & Tom II
Ziggy.description:
Poor Ziggy. He’s perpetually one step behind, one nickel short, one lane away from the fast lane. But we love him for it, because everyone feels like Ziggy now and then.
Website: https://www.gocomics.com/ziggy
About: https://www.gocomics.com/ziggy/about
Ziggy.help: Join Ziggy's adventures through life with humor!

JunkDrawer.name: Junk Drawer
JunkDrawer.author: Ellis Rosen
JunkDrawer.description:
Junk Drawer is a single panel comic that celebrates failed endeavors. There are no consistent characters or settings, instead there is an ongoing theme of finding humor in situations gone wrong. Much like a junk drawer you might find in someone’s home, this comic is a collection of charms that may not have a use but are valuable anyway. Looking at each one of these comics, it’s clear that there is not going to be a good outcome. But at least it’s funny.
Website: https://ellis-rosen.format.com/
Facebook: https://www.instagram.com/ellisjrosen/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EllisRosen
About: https://www.gocomics.com/junk-drawer/about
JunkDrawer.help: A comic full of little stories to find humor in situations gone wrong.

WorkingDaze.name: Working Daze
WorkingDaze.author: John Zakour and Scott Roberts
WorkingDaze.description:
Working Daze follows the employees trapped at MacroMicroMedia. MMM is a wanna-be software giant, and it's staffed by geeks and clueless management types. VP Rita will try anything that might make a little money (though her ideas usually don't.) Underpaid Dana carries he place and keeps it running, while overpaid Ed sleeps all day. Roy and Kathy are made for each other, and everyman Jay never knows when to keep his opinions to himself. Writer/creator John Zakour is a humor/sci-fi writer, whose work includes the Zach Johnson detective novels. Artist Scott Roberts was a longtime contributor to Nickelodeon Magazine, and is the author of the fantasy novel The Troubling Stone. John and Scott met when they both worked on the Rugrats newspaper strip.
Website: https://workingdaze.blogspot.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WorkingDazeComic/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WorkingDaze_Roy
About: https://www.gocomics.com/working-daze/about
WorkingDaze.help: Follow the adventures at MacroMicroMedia where geeks and bad management thrives!

Compu-Toon.name: Compu-Toon
Compu-Toon.author: Charles Boyce
Compu-Toon.description:
If you’ve ever struggled to turn your cell phone off, thought cookies were just a delicious snack, and tried in vain to talk to a human customer service rep, Charles Boyce has created a strip for you. Compu-toon reminds us that technological innovations haven’t necessarily made our lives any easier -- maybe just more funny.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Compu-Toon/100067759376774/
About: https://www.gocomics.com/compu-toon/about
Compu-Toon.help: If you ever felt that tech isn't always easy, Compu-Toon is the comic for you!

PixieandBrutus.name: Pixie and Brutus
PixieandBrutus.author: Pet Foolery
PixieandBrutus.description: This series focus's on the unlikely friendship between Pixie, a tiny, innocent, joyful kitten, and Brutus, a huge scar-faced retired military dog.
PixieandBrutus.help: Follow the adventures of Pixie the kitten and Brutus the dog!

Sarah'sScribbles.name: Sarah's Scribbles
Sarah'sScribbles.author: Sarah Ansdersen
Sarah'sScribbles.description:
Sarah doesn't like waking up in the morning, being productive, or dealing with social situations. “Sarah's Scribbles” is a comic strip that follows her life, finding humor in that which is weird, awkward, and embarrassing. This comic is for barely-functioning people, created by a barely-functioning person.
Website: https://sarahcandersen.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DoodleTimeSarah
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SarahCAndersen
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SarahsScribbles
About: https://sarahcandersen.com/about
Sarah'sScribbles.help: Follow the funny life of Sarah Anderson where everyone can relate!

SpeedBump.name: Speed Bump
SpeedBump.author: Dave Coverly
SpeedBump.description:
Dave Coverly admits there is no overriding theme, no tidy little philosophy that precisely describes what Speed Bump is about. "Basically," he says, "if life were a movie, these would be the outtakes."
Website: https://www.speedbump.com/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/speedbumpcomic
About: https://www.gocomics.com/speedbump/about

WallacetheBrave.name: Wallace the Brave
WallacetheBrave.author: Will Henry
WallacetheBrave.description:
Welcome to Snug Harbor! Will Henry's “Wallace the Brave” is a whimsical comic strip that centers around a bold and curious little boy named Wallace, his best friend Spud and the new girl in town, Amelia. Wallace lives in the quaint and funky town of Snug Harbor with his fisherman father, plant loving mother and feral little brother, Sterling.
Facebook: http://facebook.com/WallacetheBrave/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/MrWillHenry
About: https://www.gocomics.com/wallace-the-brave/about
WallacetheBrave.help: Follow the adventures of Wallace and his friends Spud and Amelia!

Ripley'sBelieveItorNot.name: Ripley's Believe It or Not
Ripley'sBelieveItorNot.author: Ripley's Believe It or Not!
Ripley'sBelieveItorNot.description:
Ripley's Believe It or Not! has been presenting the incredible and the unusual in illustrated form since Robert Ripley's first "Champs and Chumps" comic was published in the New York Globe on December 19, 1918. From there, Ripley set off to search the world for more incredibly hard to believe, but undeniably true stories to drawtraveling to 201 countries in 35 years.Today, artist Kieran Castaño is the eighth cartoonist to take up the pen of this legacy panel. Kieran resides in Central Florida with his bird Rosie and pup Trini  who can often be spotted in his work.

Supporting Kieran is Ripley’s Research Team, committed to finding the strangest stories, fact-checking sources, and filtering through the hundreds of weekly submissions that help bring this all-true cartoon to life. To submit your own Believe It or Not! fact, click here! 

Did you know the Ripley’s cartoon has changed history in more ways than one? In a 1929 panel, Robert Ripley pointed out that America had no national anthem, which led to legislation making the Star Spangled Banner the county’s official anthem!

Website: https://www.ripleys.com/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/RipleysBelieveItorNot
Twitter: http://twitter.com/Ripleys
About: https://www.ripleys.com/ripleys-attractions/
Ripley'sBelieveItorNot.help: The incredible and unusuals, all at the same place every day!
